title: Missing so much basic functionality
text:
Can't: -undo typing -edit font or color -highlight -minimize drafts or quickly move between drafting and reviewing emails -attach files from a searchable version of recent attachments -change order of conversation of conversation views -view pdfs in a halfway decent manner that doesn't randomly scroll or adjust all the time. Making it impossible to read long documents -(probably so much more I can't remember right now). 

 Truly hate this app so much I want to go back to android. You'd think this was a good knockoff, not Microsoft best attempt at making an ios email app.  It's infuriating my company makes me use it.

title: Only email client you should have
text:
Not because I am an Outlook customer for years. But look at the alternatives. Outlook by far is the best overall package. 

Only think I DONT like is the cloud version. I will prefer a desktop native client.
